body: If you buy a rank. Does it get you unbanned if you were already banned.
body_tagged: If you buy a rank. Does it get you unbanned if you were already banned.
title: Buying A Rank For Unban?

replies.body:
We currently don't offer buyable unbans.
The only way to get unbanned is if you appeal it.
replies.body_tagged:
We currently don't offer buyable unbans.
The only way to get unbanned is if you appeal it.

replies.body: No, You make an appeal @ https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50
replies.body_tagged: No, You make an appeal @ https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50

replies.body:
You're question has been answered 

requesting a lock...
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: No, it doesn't sorry. If you wanted to appeal your ban you can do it here, but to get the highest chance of getting unbanned you have to wait a few more months.
replies.body_tagged: No, it doesn't sorry. If you wanted to appeal your ban you can do it here, but to get the highest chance of getting unbanned you have to wait a few more months.
